translations.translation: When the earth is shaken up convulsively,
when the earth will suddenly shake with a terrible shaking,
When the earth is violently shaken
When the earth will tremble, shivering.
When the earth will be shaken with a terrible shake.
When the earth shall be shaken with a (severe) shaking,
when the earth shall be rocked
When the earth is shaken with a shock
When the earth is shaken violently,
This will happen when the earth is shaken, shaken
When the earth is shaken violently,
When the earth shall be shaken to its depths,
When the earth will be shaken with a terrible shake.
When the earth is shaken with a shock.
When the earth is shaken with convulsion
[56:4] When the earth is shaken with a violent shock,
(When the earth is shaken with a shock) when the earth is shaken with such an earthquake that every mountain and building in it will be obliterated and turn into rubble.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { إِذَا رُجَّتِ ٱلأَرْضُ رَجّاً } اضطربتْ وتَحركتْ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: اذكر يا أكمل الرسل لمن أنكر وقوعها، وتردد فيها نبذا من أماراتها وأشراطها وقت: { إِذَا رُجَّتِ } وحركت { ٱلأَرْضُ رَجّاً } [الواقعة: 4] تحريكاً شديداً عنيفاً بحث انهدمت ما عليها من الأبنية المحكمة والبقاع المشيدة
